story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: From vision to reality
story.content: reEarthly was born from a simple yet powerful belief: that every individual has the power to create positive environmental change. Our journey began when our founders witnessed firsthand the devastating effects of climate change and environmental degradation. We realized that while the problems were global, the solutions needed to be personal, practical, and accessible to everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Building a sustainable future together
mission.description: Our mission is to empower individuals, communities, and organizations to take meaningful action towards environmental sustainability. We believe that small actions, when multiplied by millions of people, can create massive positive change.
